description.en:
Occurs when the data has changed.
 Function takes first argument evt and second argument ui.
 Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the barcode widget.
 Use ui.newData to obtain the new data.
description.jp:
Occurs when the data has changed.
 Function takes first argument evt and second argument ui.
 Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the barcode widget.
 Use ui.newData to obtain the new data.

description.en:
Occurs when an error has happened.
 Function takes first argument evt and second argument ui.
 Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the barcode widget.
 Use ui.errorMessage to get or set the error message that is to be shown.
description.jp:
Occurs when an error has happened.
 Function takes first argument evt and second argument ui.
 Use ui.owner to obtain reference to the barcode widget.
 Use ui.errorMessage to get or set the error message that is to be shown.

description.en:
Gets or sets the Application Indicator assigned to identify the specification concerned by AIM International.
 The value is respected only when the Fnc1Mode is set to Industry. Its value may take the form of any single Latin alphabetic character from the set {a - z, A - Z} or a two-digit number.
description.jp:
Gets or sets the Application Indicator assigned to identify the specification concerned by AIM International.
 The value is respected only when the Fnc1Mode is set to Industry. Its value may take the form of any single Latin alphabetic character from the set {a - z, A - Z} or a two-digit number.

description.en: The width of the barcode. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).
description.jp: The width of the barcode. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

description.en: The height of the barcode. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).
description.jp: The height of the barcode. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

description.en: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the backing of the barcode.
description.jp: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the backing of the barcode.

description.en: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the backing.
description.jp: Gets or sets the brush to use for the outline of the backing.

description.en: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the backing outline.
description.jp: Gets or sets the stroke thickness of the backing outline.

description.en: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the background of the bars.
description.jp: Gets or sets the brush to use to fill the background of the bars.

description.en: Gets or sets a value which specifies how the grid fills within the barcode control dimensions.
description.jp: Gets or sets a value which specifies how the grid fills within the barcode control dimensions.

description.en: FillSpace mode ensures that the barcode grid fills the control dimensions.
description.jp: FillSpace mode ensures that the barcode grid fills the control dimensions.

description.en: EnsureEqualSize mode ensures that every grid column/row has the same pixels number width/height. The sum of all columns/rows pixels may be less than the width/height of the control.
description.jp: EnsureEqualSize mode ensures that every grid column/row has the same pixels number width/height. The sum of all columns/rows pixels may be less than the width/height of the control.

description.en: Gets or sets the data value.
description.jp: Gets or sets the data value.

description.en: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the ECI header.
description.jp: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the ECI header.

description.en: Hide the header.
description.jp: Hide the header.

description.en: Show the header.
description.jp: Show the header.

description.en:
Each Extended Channel Interpretation (ECI) is designated by a six-digit assignment number: 000000 - 999999.
 The default value depends on the loaded encodings. The default is ECI 000003 (representing ISO/IEC 8859-1) if the ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set is loaded. Otherwise the default value is 000026 (representing UTF-8).
description.jp:
Each Extended Channel Interpretation (ECI) is designated by a six-digit assignment number: 000000 - 999999.
 The default value depends on the loaded encodings. The default is ECI 000003 (representing ISO/IEC 8859-1) if the ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set is loaded. Otherwise the default value is 000026 (representing UTF-8).

description.en: Gets or sets the encoding mode for compaction of the QR Code symbol data. The default value is undefined if the Shift_JIS encoding is loaded. Otherwise the default value is byte.
description.jp: Gets or sets the encoding mode for compaction of the QR Code symbol data. The default value is undefined if the Shift_JIS encoding is loaded. Otherwise the default value is byte.

description.en: When Undefined encoding mode is set, the QR code barcode internally switches between modes as necessary in order to achieve the most efficient conversion of data into a binary string.
description.jp: When Undefined encoding mode is set, the QR code barcode internally switches between modes as necessary in order to achieve the most efficient conversion of data into a binary string.

description.en: Numeric mode encodes data from decimal digit set (0-9). Normally 3 data characters are represented by 10 bits.
description.jp: Numeric mode encodes data from decimal digit set (0-9). Normally 3 data characters are represented by 10 bits.

description.en: Alphanumerc mode encodes data from a set of 45 characters (digits 0-9, upper case letters A-Z, nine other characters: space, $ % * + _ . / : ). Normally two input characters are represented by 11 bits.
description.jp: Alphanumerc mode encodes data from a set of 45 characters (digits 0-9, upper case letters A-Z, nine other characters: space, $ % * + _ . / : ). Normally two input characters are represented by 11 bits.

description.en: In Byte mode the data is encoded at 8 bits per character. The character set of the Byte encoding mode is byte data (by default it is ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set).
description.jp: In Byte mode the data is encoded at 8 bits per character. The character set of the Byte encoding mode is byte data (by default it is ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set).

description.en: The Kanji mode efficiently encodes Kanji characters in accordance with the Shift JIS system based on JIS X 0208. Each two-byte character value is compactedd to a 13-bit binary codeword.
description.jp: The Kanji mode efficiently encodes Kanji characters in accordance with the Shift JIS system based on JIS X 0208. Each two-byte character value is compactedd to a 13-bit binary codeword.

description.en: Gets or sets the error correction level of the QR Code symbol.
description.jp: Gets or sets the error correction level of the QR Code symbol.

description.en: Low error correction level allows recovery of 7% of the symbol codewords.
description.jp: Low error correction level allows recovery of 7% of the symbol codewords.

description.en: Medium error correction level allows recovery of 15% of the symbol codewords.
description.jp: Medium error correction level allows recovery of 15% of the symbol codewords.

description.en: Quartil error correction level allows recovery of 25% of the symbol codewords.
description.jp: Quartil error correction level allows recovery of 25% of the symbol codewords.

description.en: High error correction level allows recovery of 30% of the symbol codewords.
description.jp: High error correction level allows recovery of 30% of the symbol codewords.

description.en: Gets or sets the message text displayed when some error occurs.
description.jp: Gets or sets the message text displayed when some error occurs.

description.en: Gets or sets the FNC1 mode indicator which identifies symbols encoding messages formatted according to specific predefined industry or application specificatoins.
description.jp: Gets or sets the FNC1 mode indicator which identifies symbols encoding messages formatted according to specific predefined industry or application specificatoins.

description.en: Do not use any Fnc1 symbols, i.e. the data is not identified according to specific predefined industry or application specifications.
description.jp: Do not use any Fnc1 symbols, i.e. the data is not identified according to specific predefined industry or application specifications.

description.en: Uses Fnc1 symbol in the first position of the character in Code 128 symbols and designates data formatted in accordance with the GS1 General Specification.
description.jp: Uses Fnc1 symbol in the first position of the character in Code 128 symbols and designates data formatted in accordance with the GS1 General Specification.

description.en: Uses Fnc1 symbol in the second position of the character in Code 128 symbols and designates data formatted in accordance with a specific indystry application previously agreed with AIM Inc.
description.jp: Uses Fnc1 symbol in the second position of the character in Code 128 symbols and designates data formatted in accordance with a specific indystry application previously agreed with AIM Inc.

description.en: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.
description.jp: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the control.

description.en: Gets or sets the brush to use for the label font.
description.jp: Gets or sets the brush to use for the label font.

description.en: Gets or sets the size version of the QR Code symbol.
description.jp: Gets or sets the size version of the QR Code symbol.

description.en: If set, the QR code barcode sets internally the smallest version that will accommodate the data.
description.jp: If set, the QR code barcode sets internally the smallest version that will accommodate the data.

description.en: Version1 defines size of 21x21 modules for the symbol.
description.jp: Version1 defines size of 21x21 modules for the symbol.

description.en: Version2 defines size of 25x25 modules for the symbol.
description.jp: Version2 defines size of 25x25 modules for the symbol.

description.jp: Version3 defines size of 29x29 modules for the symbol.

description.en: Gets or sets the stretch.
description.jp: Gets or sets the stretch.

description.en: The content preserves its nominal dimensions. When using fill, as the content's height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the image is not preserved which is why using this value is not recommended when the barcode is used for reading (for reading, use either none or uniform).
description.jp: The content preserves its nominal dimensions. When using fill, as the content's height and width are scaled independently, the original aspect ratio of the image is not preserved which is why using this value is not recommended when the barcode is used for reading (for reading, use either none or uniform).

description.en: The content is resized to fill the destination’s dimensions.
description.jp: The content is resized to fill the destination’s dimensions.

description.en: The content is resized to fit the destination’s dimensions while its native aspect ratio is preserved.
description.jp: The content is resized to fit the destination’s dimensions while its native aspect ratio is preserved.

description.en: The content is resized to fill the destination’s dimensions completely while it preserves its native aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of the destination rectangle differs from that of the source, the excessive source content will be cut off.
description.jp: The content is resized to fill the destination’s dimensions completely while it preserves its native aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of the destination rectangle differs from that of the source, the excessive source content will be cut off.

description.en: Gets or sets the width (XDimension) to height (YDimension) ratio. It accepts only positive values. This property does not apply for the QR barcode.
description.jp: Gets or sets the width (XDimension) to height (YDimension) ratio. It accepts only positive values. This property does not apply for the QR barcode.

description.en: Gets or sets the X-dimension (narrow element width) for a symbol in mm. It accepts values from 0.01 to 100.
description.jp: Gets or sets the X-dimension (narrow element width) for a symbol in mm. It accepts values from 0.01 to 100.
